title: Breaking Through, Rising Up
summary: Breaking Through, Rising Up: Strategies for Propelling Women of Color in Technology is the result of a groundbreaking philanthropic venture between NPower and Citi Foundation to delve into the societal, educational, economic and cultural barriers limiting young women of color from pursuing and thriving in careers in tech. This report focuses on the unique potential of nonprofit technology training programs to address unmet demands in the field, while also providing critical economic opportunities to women of color who may not have had access to traditional pipelines into technology jobs.
